thread.title: Haye: I'm in the best shape
thread.title_full: Haye: I'm in the best shape

title: Haye: I'm in the best shape
text:
McGuigan has been in Las Vegas with Carl Frampton for his rematch with Leo Santa Cruz, which the Northern Ireland fighter lost on points , and despite Bellew questioning his decision to stay away until Friday night , Haye used Frampton's fight night changing room to get a session with his coach in. 
"I am doing great," Haye said sat ringside at Frampton's clash with Santa Cruz. David Haye joined Carl Froch ringside in Las Vegas 
"I had my first session with Shane McGuigan today in the changing room, in Carl Frampton's changing room. 
"I got in late last night. We went to dinner last night, had a good chat, and talked about the tactics, what we are going to do, today did our first session. It went amazingly well. 
"I can't remember a time five weeks before a fight where I've felt as sharp and as on point as I do now." 
Watch Davide Haye v Tony Bellew, from The O2, live on Sky Sports Box Office, on March 4. Tale of the Tape - David Haye v Tony Bellew Also See:
